actors_1.Bill Nighy: Longneck, an elderly Canada goose who helps Roz understand teaching Brightbill how to fly
actors_1.Catherine O'Hara: Pinktail, a maternal Virginia opossum who gives Roz some advice on raising Brightbill
actors_1.Kit Connor: Brightbill, an orphaned runt Canada goose who is raised by Roz as her own son after losing his biological family
actors_1.Lupita Nyong'o: ROZZUM unit 7134 (Roz), an abandoned robot that was washed onto a forest island and learns to adapt to the new environment
actors_1.Mark Hamill: Thorn, a grizzly bear and the island's most feared predator
actors_1.Matt Berry: Paddler, a neurotic beaver who spends his days trying to gnaw down a giant tree
actors_1.Pedro Pascal: Fink, a mischievous red fox who is the first animal that Roz helps and befriends
actors_1.Stephanie Hsu: Vontra, a cruel, tentacled robot sent by Universal Dynamics to retrieve Roz
actors_1.Ving Rhames: Thunderbolt, a peregrine falcon who helps Brightbill learn to fly

actors_2.Dan Starkey: Danny and Dennys, Lord Carnaby's bickering henchmen
actors_2.Eleanor Tomlinson: Nefer, an irrepressible princess who loves singing
actors_2.Joe Thomas: Thut, an ex-chariot racer left with post-traumatic stress disorder after a crash

actors_4.Alicia Grace Turrell: Ethel, a cow at Lactose Farms and Otto's love interest
actors_4.Angus Cloud: Snickers, a small purple cat and another of Vic's former crewmembers
actors_4.Bowen Yang: Nolan, a small whippet and one of Jinx's henchmen
actors_4.Brett Goldstein: Roland, a large Shar Pei and one of Jinx's henchmen
actors_4.Cameron Bernard Jones: Barry, an eastern bluebird and one of Jinx's henchmen
actors_4.Cecily Strong: Marge Malone, the dedicated Animal Control officer of Lactose Farms
actors_4.Chris Pratt: Garfield, an overweight, sarcastic and lazy orange tabby cat
actors_4.Dev Joshi: a veterinarian and Jon's love interest
actors_4.Hannah Waddingham: Jinx, a ruthless white Persian cat and one of Vic's former crewmembers
actors_4.Harvey Guillen: Odie, a yellow beagle and Garfield's best friend
actors_4.Janelle James: Olivia, a green cat and another of Vic's former crewmembers
actors_4.Jeff Foxworthy: a bird that was zapped on a Lactose Farms fence
actors_4.Nicholas Hoult: Jon Arbuckle, Garfield and Odie's owner
actors_4.Snoop Dogg: Maurice, a blue Maine Coon with an eyepatch and another of Vic's former crewmembers
actors_4.Ving Rhames: Otto, a purple Highland bull and the former mascot of Lactose Farms

actors_5.Grey DeLisle: Ma Cheeks, Granny Cheeks, Rowdy Cheeks, and Rosie Cheeks
actors_5.Mr. Lawrence: Plankton, Larry the Lobster and others
actors_5.Tom Kenny: SpongeBob SquarePants, Gary the Snail and others

title_5: Saving Bikini Bottom: The Sandy Cheeks Movie
